levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, however only heal allies with less than 50% HP. When allies within range fall below <@ba.vup>{max_hp_ratio:0%}</> HP, immediately heal them for <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of Tuye's ATK. The skill ends when this effect is triggered 3 times. <@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
